sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Serbia calls on NATO troops to guarantee security inside Kosovo after clashes on Friday injured more than a dozen people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Serbian border troops are on high alert following clashes in Kosovo that injured more than a dozen people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: On Friday, ethnic Serbs in northern Kosovo had tried to block newly elected ethnic Albanian officials from entering municipal buildings.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Serbia's defense minister called on NATO-led peacekeepers to stop the violence. I am in contact with the Forum and I expect the Forum to be much more engaged on the ground, to guarantee security, freedom, human rights to all citizens living on the territory of the region, to stop it from happening, whether it is ili Albanci ili neka druga nacija. minority representatives were elected to the assembly and mayoral posts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Tens of thousands gathered in Belgrade on Friday for a massive pro-government rally amidst growing

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: discontent following two recent mass shootings. Public sector employees were encouraged to participate with the some fearing job loss if they didn't. Our correspondent Stefan Goranovich has his report from Belgrade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The rally of the ruling Serbian Progressive Party was held in the center of Belgrade in the days when, at the invitation of the opposition, tens of thousands of people were protesting, dissatisfied with the government's response to the mass murders that rocked the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The party called the rally Serbia of Hope, and the invitation was sent to the mass murders that rocked the country. The party called the rally Serbia of Hope and the invitation was sent to the citizens by the president of Serbia and the leader of the party, Aleksandar Vucic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The opposition accuses Vucic's party of pressuring and threatening employees of state institutions to attend the rally.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The authorities rejected such claims.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The rally is being held in the same month when 18 people were killed in two mass murders in Serbia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Stefan Goranovich, Euronews, Belgrade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: At least two people have been killed and 23 injured in an apparent Russian missile strike on a medical clinic in the Ukrainian city of Dnipro.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Two children were among the wounded.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Local officials said one of those who died was a 69-year-old man.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Several buildings were heavily damaged in the attack, which caused fires over a wide area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russia has stepped up airstrikes across Ukraine in recent weeks as Kyiv prepares its forces for a counteroffensive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian air defences said they repelled multiple attempted missile and drone strikes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russia has also seen an increase in air attacks, which it blames on Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The mayor of the border city of Krasnodar said a residential building and an office were damaged after being targeted by drones.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: There were no reports of injuries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Elsewhere, Russian authorities said areas of the Belgorod region came under artillery fire from Ukrainian forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Belgian aid worker Olivier van der Kasteel, who was detained in Iran for 15 months on espionage charges, landed in Belgium late on Friday after being released as part of a prisoner exchange.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Friday after being released as part of a prisoner exchange. The 42-year-old was greeted by family members at a military base near Brussels after flying in from Oman, where he was swapped for an Iranian diplomat convicted of attempting to bomb exiles in France.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Belgian government has defended the controversial exchange, saying Olivier's life was always the most important.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Wretched Tayyip Erdogan has closed his Turkish presidential campaign at a rally in Istanbul in front of thousands of supporters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He goes into Sunday's runoff poll as favourite, despite anger in the south over his handling of the aftermath of the disastrous earthquake in February.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In the first round, the moderate Islamist president took 49.5 percent of the votes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But since then, he's managed to attract the backing of nationalist Saini Noam, who obtained five percent of the votes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Observers say he should be on track for victory over rival Kamal Kilicderoglu and a second term.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: His Social Democrat opponent is backed by varied coalition partners.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Recently he's played the nationalist card, pledging to repatriate around 3.5 million Syrian refugees.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: As well as the earthquake, Sunday's poll takes place against the backdrop of a country battered by an economic crisis with its currency in tatters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Erdogan has been in power for 20 years, but he still has huge popular pull.
